message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1000000. It's a unique opportunity, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the unique opportunity you're providing. I would like to counter with an offer of $800000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your offer.  While it's close, I need a bit more to make this work. I'm willing to come down to $900000. This would still allow me to make a reasonable profit while also giving you a great deal on this valuable product.
I've considered your proposal, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $850000. This price reflects the value I see in the product and aligns closely with my budget.
